name: Mission Saggitarus
description:
Agent you are on a mission; A mission to find the secret of a deadly bomb created to destroy the human race. Your task is to go through all the planes and try to find the secret and you must try your best to escape the enemie's ships. REMEMBER, YOU CANNOT FAIL !!

CONTROLS
  • Use WASD or up, down, left, right arrous for movement.
  • Use Space Bar for shooting lazers.
